tasks.label: Clean and Build - generic_stm32f103_bluepill - jlink
tasks.command: rm -rf build && west build -b generic_stm32f103_bluepill && west flash --runner jlink --device STM32F103C8

tasks.label: Clean and Build - weact_stm32h562_core - jlink
tasks.command: rm -rf build && west build -b weact_stm32h562_core && west flash --runner jlink --device STM32F103C8

tasks.label: Clean and Build - weact_stm32h562_core - stlink
tasks.command: rm -rf build && west build -b weact_stm32h562_core && west flash --runner stlink --device STM32F103C8
